title: Could not retrieve state: Missing header log spam
body:
The debug log is spammed with thousands of messages like these:

```
[DBUG] [01-10|22:39:27.032] Could not retrieve state: Missing header missing=0xba54b1a82f935d0508f7fd6a5c523ec38295c16ab28f5a8f7bba60c530eb7e0b

```

In this case the header is the same, but it is produced for other headers as well.
The timestamps are very close like if it was a live loop polling.

The log has missing 63 headers with 268764 total log messages during 4 hours of running.

Running devel @ 95109d980058ddb327e4199eae362184580bf1cb on mainnet with:

```
--prune=htrc
--internalcl
```
